column1: appeal for the consideration of the Court in his written submissions.
1.  The learned High Court Judge has failed to consider the credibility and
the probability of the prosecutrix’s version.

3.  The  learned  High  Court  Judge  has  unreasonably  rejected  the  dock

4.  The learned High Court Judge’s intervention and interjections resulted
